Blog Posts

April 2020

  • Helping the World Health Organisation with COVID-19 Posted on Tue, Apr 07, 2020 Today, I took part in a session, led by Gerry McGovern, to help the World Health Organisation (WHO) identify and classify the most important information about COVID-19 on their website. If the WHO can make information easier to find and understand, it makes a practical difference to the world's response to the pandemic.
  • My Privacy Policy Posted on Mon, Apr 06, 2020 An explanation of the privacy policy on this website. Spoiler alert—it's very short.
